sense.def:
An account
je pisno ali ustno sporočilo o nekem dogodku.

seg.quote: There were accounts of the incident in the paper.

sense.def:
Accounts
so podrobna poročila o vsem denarju, ki ga neka oseba ali podjetje prejme ali potroši.

seg.quote: He had to submit accounts of his expenditure.

sense.def:
To have an account with a bank
pomeni, da imamo svoj denar v tisti banki in ga dvigamo, kadar ga potrebujemo.

To have an account with a shop or company
pomeni, da v tisti trgovini ali podjetju lahko dobivamo blago ali usluge in zanje plačamo pozneje.

To take something into account
pomeni o tistem razmisliti, kadar se pripravljamo na določene okoliščine.

To do something on account of something or someone
pomeni, da nekaj naredimo zaradi nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: ‘Auntie told me not to run,’ he explained, ‘on account of my asthma.’

sense.def:
Izraz
on no account
uporabimo, kadar hočemo reči, da nečesa pod nobenim pogojem ne bi smeli storiti.

seg.quote: On no account must strangers be let in.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
of no account
, je povsem brez smisla.

To account for something
pomeni povedati, kako se je nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: How do you account for the dent in the car?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
accounts for a particular part or proportion of a whole thing
, gre za tisto, iz česar je sestavljen neki del ali odstotek celote.

seg.quote: Computer software accounts for some 70 per cent of our range of products.
